title: how do i change my profile picture on here?
body: So how do I change my profile picture here? {{champion:245}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:245}} Um please be concise and clear in your explainations so as not to confuse me and be kind no questions are dumb questions. I bymistake added three ekko icons i am a mess please send help.~~~~

replies.body: You can just change your profile picture on the client! Sometimes it might take a bit for it to update, but your Summoner and Boards profiles are linked.
I hope that me commenting on here will make this post more visible to all. Once again, thank you for your time.
